title: Understanding the Range
text: The range of a set of numbers is the difference between the largest and smallest numbers in the set.

title: Identify the Largest and Smallest Values
text: Look at the set of numbers: {2,2,5,6,7}. What is the largest number? What is the smallest number?

title: Calculate the Range
text: Now that you have identified the largest number (7) and the smallest number (2), calculate the range by subtracting the smallest number from the largest number.
